last_episode_to_air.name: The Hammer Comes Down
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Yoo's victims are found buried and mutilated, a media storm descends upon the case. In need of tangible evidence, police head to his apartment.

name: The Raincoat Killer: Chasing a Predator in Korea
overview: In the early 2000s, Yoo Young-chul hammered his victims to death and cast fear across Seoul. This docuseries recounts the hunt for a prolific killer.

episodes.name: New Breed of Killer
episodes.overview: Violent killings target wealthy victims around the city. Matching footprints found at each scene suggest a serial murderer on the loose.

episodes.name: Killing Grounds
episodes.overview: A report about missing sex workers leads to Yoo Young-chul's arrest. Under interrogation, he confesses, but detectives aren't sure what to believe.

episodes.name: The Hammer Comes Down
episodes.overview: As Yoo's victims are found buried and mutilated, a media storm descends upon the case. In need of tangible evidence, police head to his apartment.
